typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		location as string,
		singles_utr as string,
		doubles_utr as string,
		grad as string,
		age as string,
		first_name as string,
		last_name as string,
		name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> utrdata
source(output(
		name as string,
		initial_singles_utr as string,
		latest_singles_utr as string,
		initial_doubles_utr as string,
		grad_year as string,
		location as string,
		date_first_added as string,
		last_updated as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> excel
utrdata, excel exists(utrdata@name == excel@name,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> NewNames
utrdata, excel exists(utrdata@name == excel@name,
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> ExistingNames
ExistingNames, excel join(utrdata@name == excel@name,
	joinType:'right',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 select(mapColumn(
		name = excel@name,
		singles_utr,
		location = excel@location,
		initial_singles_utr,
		initial_doubles_utr,
		grad_year,
		current_singles_utr = singles_utr,
		date_first_added
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 derive(last_updated = iif(or(isNull(singles_utr),equals(singles_utr,"")), toString(currentDate('America/New_York')), date_first_added),
		date_first_added = iif(or(isNull(singles_utr),equals(singles_utr,"")), toString(currentDate('America/New_York')), date_first_added),
		latest_singles_utr = iif(or(isNull(singles_utr),equals(singles_utr,"")), initial_singles_utr, singles_utr)) ~> DerivedColumn1
NewNames derive(grad_year = grad,
		date_first_added = toString(currentDate('America/New_York')),
		last_updated = toString(currentDate('America/New_York')),
		initial_singles_utr = singles_utr) ~> DerivedColumn2
DerivedColumn2 select(mapColumn(
		name,
		location,
		initial_singles_utr,
		singles_utr,
		initial_doubles_utr = doubles_utr,
		grad_year,
		date_first_added,
		last_updated
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
DerivedColumn1, Select2 union(byName: true)~> Union1
Union1 select(mapColumn(
		name,
		initial_singles_utr,
		latest_singles_utr,
		initial_doubles_utr,
		grad_year,
		location,
		date_first_added,
		last_updated
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> OrderColumns
OrderColumns sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		name as string,
		initial_singles_utr as string,
		latest_singles_utr as string,
		initial_doubles_utr as string,
		grad_year as string,
		location as string,
		date_first_added as string,
		last_updated as string
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
